title: Black bean and avocado burritos
ingredients: ['Salsa', '4 avocados - peeled, pitted, and cubed', '3 tomatoes, diced', '2 (400g) tins black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 (400g) tin corn, rinsed and drained', '1 small bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '1/2 red onion, minced', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'Additional ingredients', '8 flour tortillas', '120g grated cheese', '4 tablespoons soured cream, or to taste']
